document_data.name: ''Flaming''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Flaming''''' was an enchantment that caused flames to sheathe a weapon.
document_data.Powers: This [[weapon quality|quality]] was command-word activated and the flames that enveloped the weapon did not harm the wielder. The flames burned a target upon being struck. Missile weapons conferred this ability on any ammunition launched from them.
document_data.Creation: The creator must use ''[[flame blade]]'', ''[[flame strike]]'', or ''[[fireball]]'' to add the ''flaming'' property.
document_data.Uses:
[[Movanic deva]]s typically wielded ''flaming'' [[greatsword]]s.

Some experienced [[Thayan gladiator]]s had their horns, claws, and other natural weapons enhanced as ''flaming'' weapons.
